# Spell Enhancer (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[Book of Experimental Might Wizard Spell Lists|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC)Â­, pg. 198

*You utter an ancient word tied to the fundamental principles of magic and immediately begin casting another spell.*

This spell enhances the next spell you cast, making it more difficult for targets to resist. The next spell you cast this round is cast at +2 caster level, and its save DC increases by 1.

**GM Note**

In the World of Greyhawk setting, this spell is also known as *Rary's spell enhancer*.
